TextView.android:text: Preventive Maintenance Schedule : MONTHLY \n ASMGCS SAAB
1.3 MLAT Media Converter:Status of NMM2 i-Converters:
Failover test for Left and Right channel of Transceiver and Encoders.

a) Log in to the transceiver user interface.\nb) Use the drop-down menu for Primary Channel to switch the channel that is currently primary to backup.\nc) Make sure that the new primary channel works immediately and without interruption to processing.

a) Log in to the transceiver user interface.\nb) Use the drop-down menu for Primary Encoder to switch the encoder that is currently primary to backup.\nc) Make sure that the new primary encoder works immediately and without interruption to processing.
Check all Earth-pits are clean/ accessible. Earth Strip and its Connections are rust free and not damaged.
Combined Earth Pits Earth Resistance ( less then 5 ohms)
Battery Voltage(After Mains is OFF for 30 min)
Sensor Node RF Transmit (For R/T only)
Check all the Earth-pits are clean/ accessible, Earth Strip and Its connections are rust free and not damaged.
Combined Earth Pits Earth Resistance (less then 5 ohms)
Check Azimuth of superimposed video near LLZ:\n(Adjust the Antenna offset parameter in RDP, if required)
Verify that no false tracks are present at RWY Threshold and Edge (Correlative action, if any)
Check test targets availability on CMS. \n(if marginal, adjust the Threshold Values in RDP as and if required)
Check all Earth-pits are clean/ accessible. Earth Strip and its Connections are rust free and not damaged.
Combined Earth Pits Earth Resistance ( less then 5 ohms)
